name: Vigilant Sentry
originalText:
Threshold Vigilant Sentry gets +1/+1 and has "oc
T: Target attacking or blocking creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn." (You have threshold as long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard.)
text: Threshold — As long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard, Vigilant Sentry gets +1/+1 and has "{T}: Target attacking or blocking creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn."
